#  Helix configuration

![helix](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/16523706/326258762-36a590c9-a2fc-41aa-a3b8-14e368333b88.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..mz-DDKlzH4T6MvpWVTRzVsbehBJksePgHwkqfHyybZo)

## How to install ?

Only support linux and glibc >= 2.28.

```bash
git clone https://github.com/hbuxiaofei/helixll && cd helixll && ./install
```

## Key map

Native tree-view Key map: `space + e`

or

[xplr](https://github.com/sayanarijit/xplr) tree-view Key map: `space + E`
